Entry.JapaneseText: ここもベルサスなんだよな？
以前、この街を訪れたのはずいぶん前の事になるが、 その時には、まだこの集落はなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: It's been a while, but when I last visited this town, there was no such settlement here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 住んでる連中もガジュマだけみたいだぜ。 これも、もしかして<Blue>思念<White>の影響か？
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that everyone living here is a Gajuma. Could this be another repercussion of the <Blue>Will<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ううむ……最近できたようには 見えないが……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... It doesn't look as though it was built recently...
